thread.title_full: What happened to Ayesha Takia? Plastic srugery gone wrong?

title: What happened to Ayesha Takia? Plastic srugery gone wrong?
text: What happened to Ayesha Takia? Plastic srugery gone wrong? Web Team /Mumbai Filed on February 25, 2017 Share Vote The wanted actress doesn't look the same anymore. Ayesha Takia hasn't acted in a Bollywood movie after her marriage a few years ago. But she shocked everyone with her new looks when she attended a recent event. The wanted actress doesn't look the same anymore, according to a DNA Indi a report. Ayesha's bee stung lips and her frozen face are strong evidences of a plastic surgery gone terribly wrong. Although Ayesha has not given out any statement in the media about the same yet, she decided to retaliate with a message on Instagram. A post shared by Ayesha Takia Azmi (@ayeshatakia) on Feb 24, 2017 at 12:14am PST After the pictures and news of her going under the knife went viral, Ayesha put up a picture on Instagram which said: "You can be the ripest, juiciest peach in the world, and there's still going to be somebody who hates peaches." A post shared by Ayesha Takia Azmi (@ayeshatakia) on Feb 23, 2017 at 9:11pm PST Ayesha, who made her debut in the entertainment industry in "Meri chunar ud ud jaaye", a music video by Falguni Pathak looked like this back then. Here are a few of her Instagram posts where she is nearly unrecognisable for any of us who have seen her previously. A post shared by Ayesha Takia Azmi (@ayeshatakia) on Feb 23, 2017 at 11:29pm PST A post shared by Ayesha Takia Azmi (@ayeshatakia) on Feb 22, 2017 at 12:05am PST As expected, Ayesha Takia gets trolled on Twitter for her drastic makeover. Here are some of the tweets; Wonder why Ayesha Takia aspired to become a cross between Priyanka Chopra and Kylie Jenner. pic.twitter.com/dJeA5xUhMP
